alert.note: Alert for Barry; Van Buren (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 16 at 8:50PM EST until January 17 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Barry and Van Buren counties. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling.
